name: 5 Days on Royal Scotsman First Class Train
description:
Skip the waitlist and invest in blue-chip art for the very first time by signing up for Masterworks: https://masterworks.art/trektrendy
Purchase shares in great masterpieces from artists like Pablo Picasso, Banksy, Andy Warhol, and more.
See important Masterworks disclosures: http://masterworks.io/cd

Today i'm taking one of the worldâ€™s most luxurious trains, the famous Royal Scotsman in First Class. Millie & I will spend five days onboard in a private ensuite bedroom, as we explore the beautiful Scottish highlands. Starting in Edinburgh we'll head North towards Inverness and after stable overnight in a siding, continue on to the Isle of Skye. I'll show you exactly what it's like on this once in a lifetime trip... especially given ticket prices are north of $15,000. This is the first fully documented trip available on YouTube, so join us and find out for real what it's like. From two dining rooms, an observation car with the only outside viewing platform in Europe plus a variety of exciting off train activities like seal spotting and exploring a privately owned castle.

Thanks to my friend Jarvis, for assisting in all the finer details when booking this trip. If you'd like to do something similar please check out his website: https://theluxurytraveller.com/

2:09 - Our Bedroom
6:41 - The highlands

10:08 - Seal spotting 
14:04 - Formal dinner 
19:33 - Private Castle 
21:14 - Dancing
22:13 - The cost
